File libsrc/libmath/covar.c

Compute the covariance matrix for 3 components. 
  Input *e, *n, *z, all length n.
  Output s = 3 by 3 symmetric matrix s[i+j*3].
  
  e = x, n = y, z = z;
 
 	|ee en ez|
  s = 	|ne nn nz|
 	|ze zn zz|

Public Functions

covar 
 void covar(int npts,
            float *e,
            float *n,
            float *z,
            double *s)
Compute the covariance matrix for 3 components.
